name: Bloom (itch) (TheDoritoDom, NickGamesDev, BonusLoaf, FaintSkyGames)
description:
Description:

Play as Lady, the cute little ladybug on an adventure to bring sun light to the flowers of the land, use mirrors and magnifying glasses to direct the sun light to the flowers. This game was developed in a 24 hour time period for the GDS Spring Jam

Controls:

  • A/D or Left and Right keys  to Move Player left and right
  • Space to Jump
  • W to pick up Objects
  • S to drop Objects

Team Members:

  • https://thedoritodom.itch.io/
  • https://faintskygames.itch.io/
  • https://bonusloaf.itch.io/
  • https://nick1441.itch.io/
